verses.verse: I <S%H7355>love<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, my <S%H2391>strength.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock,<s%> my <S%H4686>fortress,<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> my <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H6697>rock,<s%> in whom I take <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> my <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> my high <S%H4869>tower.<s%>
I <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised;<s%> and I am <S%H3467>saved<s%> from my <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>surrounded<s%> <S%H5158>me.<s%> The floods of <S%H1100>ungodliness<s%> made me <S%H1204>afraid.<s%>
The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> were <S%H5437>around<s%> <S%H4170>me.<s%> The snares of <S%H4194>death<s%> came on <S%H6923>me.<s%>

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7768>cried<s%> to my <S%H430>God.<s%> He <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H1964>temple.<s%> My <S%H7775>cry<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H935>came<s%> into his <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled.<s%> The <S%H4146>foundations<s%> also of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7264>quaked<s%> and were <S%H1607>shaken,<s%> because he was <S%H2734>angry.<s%>
<S%H6227>Smoke<s%> went <S%H5927>out<s%> of his <S%H639>nostrils.<s%> <S%H398>Consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> came out of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> <S%H1513>Coals<s%> were kindled by <S%H1197>it.<s%>
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3381>also,<s%> and came down. Thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was under his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
He <S%H7392>rode<s%> on a <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H5774>flew.<s%> <S%H5774>Yes,<s%> he soared on the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

He <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> his hiding <S%H5643>place,<s%> his <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H2824>him,<s%> darkness of <S%H4325>waters,<s%> thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H5645>skies.<s%>
At the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> before him his thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H5674>passed,<s%> <S%H1259>hailstones<s%> and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> also <S%H7481>thundered<s%> in the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> The Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H1259>hailstones<s%> and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
He sent <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H1300>them;<s%> Yes, great lightning <S%H7232>bolts,<s%> and routed <S%H2000>them.<s%>

Then the <S%H650>channels<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>appeared.<s%> The <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were laid <S%H1540>bare<s%> at your <S%H1606>rebuke,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> at the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of your <S%H639>nostrils.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from on <S%H4791>high.<s%> He <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4871>me.<s%> He drew me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H341>enemy,<s%> from those who <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H553>me;<s%> for they were too mighty for me.
They came <S%H6923>on<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was my <S%H4937>support.<s%>
He brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a large <S%H4800>place.<s%> He <S%H2502>delivered<s%> <S%H2654>me,<s%> because he delighted in me.
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> According to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> has he recompensed <S%H7725>me.<s%>
For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have not wickedly <S%H7561>departed<s%> from my <S%H430>God.<s%>
For all his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> were before <S%H5493>me.<s%> I didn't put away his statutes from <S%H2708>me.<s%>
I was also <S%H8549>blameless<s%> with <S%H8104>him.<s%> I kept myself from my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7725>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyesight.<s%>
With the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> you will show yourself <S%H2616>merciful.<s%> With the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1399>man,<s%> you will show yourself <S%H8552>perfect.<s%>
With the <S%H1305>pure,<s%> you will show yourself <S%H1305>pure.<s%> With the <S%H6141>crooked<s%> you will show yourself <S%H6141>shrewd.<s%>
For you will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> but the <S%H7311>haughty<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> you will bring <S%H8213>down.<s%>
For you will <S%H215>light<s%> my <S%H5216>lamp,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> My <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5050>light<s%> up my <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
For by <S%H7323>you,<s%> I advance through a <S%H1416>troop.<s%> By my <S%H430>God,<s%> I leap <S%H1801>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall.<s%>

As for <S%H410>God,<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect.<s%> The <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H6884>tried.<s%> He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to all those who take refuge in <S%H2620>him.<s%>
For who is <S%H433>God,<s%> <S%H1107>except<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> Who is a <S%H6697>rock,<s%> <S%H2108>besides<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%>
the <S%H410>God<s%> who <S%H247>arms<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength,<s%> and <S%H5414>makes<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8549>perfect?<s%>
He <S%H7737>makes<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>deer<s%>'s <S%H5975>feet,<s%> and sets me on my high <S%H1116>places.<s%>
He <S%H3925>teaches<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%> so that my <S%H2220>arms<s%> <S%H5181>bend<s%> a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>bronze.<s%>

You have also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation.<s%> Your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H5582>sustains<s%> <S%H6037>me.<s%> Your gentleness has made me <S%H7235>great.<s%>
You have <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> under <S%H7166>me,<s%> My feet have not <S%H4571>slipped.<s%>
I will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H7725>them.<s%> Neither will I turn again until they are <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>
I will <S%H4272>strike<s%> them <S%H3201>through,<s%> so that they will not be able to <S%H6965>rise.<s%> They shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> under my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
For you have <S%H247>armed<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%> You have <S%H3766>subdued<s%> under me those who rose up against <S%H6965>me.<s%>
You have also <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their <S%H6203>backs<s%> to <S%H6789>me,<s%> that I might cut off those who hate <S%H8130>me.<s%>
They <S%H7768>cried,<s%> but there was none to <S%H3467>save;<s%> even to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but he <S%H6030>didn't<s%> answer them.
Then I <S%H7833>beat<s%> them small as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind.<s%> I cast them <S%H7324>out<s%> as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

You have <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>strivings<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%> You have <S%H7760>made<s%> me the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> A <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have not <S%H3045>known<s%> shall serve <S%H5647>me.<s%>
As soon as they <S%H8088>hear<s%> of me they shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H1121>me.<s%> The foreigners shall submit themselves to <S%H3584>me.<s%>
The <S%H1121>foreigners<s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away,<s%> and shall come <S%H2727>trembling<s%> out of their close <S%H4526>places.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives;<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock.<s%> <S%H7311>Exalted<s%> be the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%>
even the <S%H410>God<s%> who executes <S%H5414>vengeance<s%> for <S%H1696>me,<s%> and subdues peoples under <S%H5971>me.<s%>

He <S%H6403>rescues<s%> me from my <S%H341>enemies.<s%> <S%H7311>Yes,<s%> you lift me up above those who rise <S%H7311>up<s%> against <S%H5337>me.<s%> You deliver me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
Therefore I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

He gives <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> to his <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H6213>shows<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> and to his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
